metadata.certificationHash: string - IPFS hash or certification identifier
metadata.totalSupply: uint256 - total token supply in wei
metadata.minInvestment: uint256 - minimum investment amount in wei

parameters.name: string - token name (e.g., 'Gold Token')
parameters.totalSupply: uint256 - total token supply (same as metadata.totalSupply)

example.metadata: (PreciousMetals, LBMA Certified Vaults, London, 2000000000000000000000, 1754500596, ipfs://QmGoldCertification123, true, 0x6dCbEA0Fa11B21a6B9F72BccaceFeb0B1ED0B444, 10000000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000)
example.name: Gold Token

note: Send 100 tokens (1e20 wei) as token creation fee
